DOC.brief_summary: Study evaluate % SpO2 accuracy performance Nonin Medical pulse oximetry system .
DOC.brief_title: SpO2 Accuracy Validation Pulse Oximetry Systems During Motion Non-Motion Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: Study evaluate % SpO2 accuracy performance Nonin Medical pulse oximetry system motion non-motion .
DOC.criteria: The subject male female The subject racial ethnic group The subject > 30 kg ( > 66 pound ) weight ( selfreported ) The subject least one finger height 0.2 1.0 inch ( base measurement ) The subject 18 year 45 year age ( self=reported ) The subject show evidence medical problem indicate satisfactory completion health assessment form The subject give write informed consent participate study The subject willing able comply study procedure . The subject BMI great 31 ( base weight height ) The subject relevant injury sensor location site ( selfreported ) The subject deformity abnormality may prevent proper application device test ( base examination ) The subject current smoker ( selfreported ) The subject know respiratory condition ( selfreported ) The subject know heart cardiovascular condition ( selfreported ) The subject currently pregnant ( selfreported ) The subject actively try get pregnant ( selfreported ) The subject clot disorder ( selfreported ) The subject Raynaud 's Disease ( selfreported ) The subject know hemoglobinopathy ( selfreported ) The subject blood thinner medication aspirin ( selfreported ) The subject unacceptable collateral circulation ulnar artery ( base examination ) The subject unwilling unable provide write informed consent participate study The subject unwilling unable comply study procedures The subject another health condition opinion principal investigator make him/her unsuitable testing .
